vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy_bonus.withdrawReward (patch_11.sol#8-13) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- success = recipient.send(rewardsForA[recipient]) (patch_11.sol#11)
